cashback.title: Cashback
cashback.text: By activating this feature, you agree that you want to claim your bonus

slippage.title: Slippage Tolerance
slippage.text: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.

priceImpact.title: Price impact
priceImpact.text: We will not let you perform a swap if the price impact is more than this percentage.

intermediate.title: Intermediate Tokens
intermediate.text: You can configure the max number of intermediate tokens, thereby controlling the length of the route. The longer it is, the more gas it will consume and the higher the probability of receiving an intermediate token instead of the desired one if swapping through highly volatile pools or with low slippage.

volatility.title: Pools Volatility
volatility.text: You can exclude routes that use highly volatile (and therefore high-risk) pools. Volatility is considered the ratio of the max and min price rates in the pool over the last 15 minutes.

parallel.title: Parallel transactions
parallel.text: You can set the maximum number of parallel transactions, which allows for build more profitable routes.
parallel.textW5: Get the option to choose up to 20 routes with
parallel.tooltip: However, this also increases the amount of gas that will be consumed and the probability of receiving an intermediate token instead of the desired one when swapping.

sources.title: Sources of liquidity
sources.text: Disabling the source of liquidity excludes it from the route

Welcome to the Claim Center — your personal hub for managing rewards on swap.coffee. 

 We designed it to make the reward collection process as simple and enjoyable as possible.

Share your referral link with other users
referralInfo.level-tooltip: As the number of your referrals and their volume increases, you can qualify for higher commission rewards and a custom, attractive link.

referralLink.caption: Your referral link
referralLink.description: This is your referral link, as soon as your friend clicks on the link, he will automatically become your referral

questions: How is the reward percentage calculated?
What is the referral system level?
How to increase the reward percentage?
answers:
The reward percentage is based on your level.
swap.coffee does not charge users any additional fees. We share a portion of our commission profits with the user, ensuring there are no extra costs.
The level of the referral system indicates your percentage of income from referrals. The higher the level, the higher the reward percentage.
Only new users can be invited as referrals. Users who have previously used swap.coffee cannot be invited as referrals.
Tools for level upgrades will be added later. Special conditions apply for influencers. For details, please contact our Telegram.

On the referral program page, you can see the total amount of your earnings. This includes all your referrals from all DEX.
In the claim center, you can request the amount earned from StonFi. Rewards from DeDust will be available for claiming later, after their distribution.
referralFaq.levels:
We have three commission levels:
Bronze - For all users
Silver - For CES stakers (Coming soon)
Gold - For influencers

referral-banner.title: Referral program
referral-banner.description: Welcome to the world of earning opportunities with the swap.coffee Referral Program! Invite friends and earn a percentage of the commission from their transactions!

cashback.bannerTopText: Reward Program for your activity on the platform.
cashback.bannerBottomText: Like traditional banking, but fully decentralized.
terms: Use swap.coffee and receive cashback in {token} for every exchange. The reward is credited at a rate of {percent}% of the transaction volume. The maximum reward for 1 day is {dailyLimit} {token}, and for all time - {totalLimit} {token}. In total, {distributed} {token} will be distributed.

Use swap.coffee and earn cashback in {token} for every swap in the token pair {pair1} and {pair2}. The reward is calculated at {percent}% of the transaction volume. The maximum reward per day is {dailyLimit} {token}, and for all time - {totalLimit} {token}. A total of {distributed} {token} will be distributed.

Use swap.coffee and earn cashback in {token} for every swap in the token pair with {pair1}. The reward is calculated at {percent}% of the transaction volume. The maximum reward per day is {dailyLimit} {token}, and for all time - {totalLimit} {token}. A total of {distributed} {token} will be distributed.
cashback.specialTerms:
Use swap.coffee and earn cashback in XROCK!

The reward is 0.01% of the transaction amount. The maximum reward per day is 10 XROCK, and the total reward is 100 XROCK. A total of 55,000 XROCK will be distributed.

Additionally, 42,000 XROCK will be distributed for exchanges in pairs with XROCK. The reward is 0.035% of the transaction amount. The maximum reward per day is 30 XROCK, and the maximum reward per month is 300 XROCK.
cashback.specialTerms1:
Use swap.coffee and earn cashback in STORM!

The reward is credited at 0.01% of the transaction amount. The maximum reward per day is 250 STORM, and the lifetime reward is 2,500 STORM. A total of 65,000 STORM will be distributed.

Additionally, 50,000 STORM will be distributed among swaps paired with STORM.
The reward is credited at 0.035% of the transaction amount. The maximum reward per day is 250 STORM, and the monthly reward is 2,500 STORM.

contestPage.withoutPlace: You are not in the table
contestPage.empty: The list of competitions is empty.
contestPage.leaderboardEmpty:
The leaderboard is empty.
 No one has participated in the contest yet
contestPage.bannerSubtitle: Welcome to the thrilling world of swap.coffee Trading Competitions!

questions: How do I participate in a trading contest?
Do intermediate tokens count towards trading volume?
Can I participate in several trading contests at the same time?
I won in a trading contest. How do I get my prize?
answers: Trade any pair with a token on which there is an active trading contest. You can either buy or sell a token.
Yes. If both tokens you trade are participating in a contest, one exchange transaction will be counted in both contests.
All rewards will be credited to the Rewards Center within 30 days after the contest ends.

questions: How can I claim my rewards?
Can I withdraw staked tokens early?
Do you have access to my tokens?
answers: The reward depends on the number of Points you have. The more Points you have, the larger the share of the total reward pool you will receive.
Rewards are automatically credited to the Claim Center. You can claim them at any convenient time.
Points are a universal unit for measuring your contribution to {token} staking. You can earn more Points by staking LP tokens and/or choosing a longer staking period.
The pool share is the ratio of your Points to the total number of Points held by all staking participants. The higher your share, the more rewards you will receive.

The pool's APR is dynamic and depends on various factors, such as the number of rewards in the pool and their market value, as well as the amount and value of staked {token} (including {token} LP tokens).
No. Your tokens are staked in a smart contract, and only you can withdraw them after the staking period ends.

snowflakePopup.itemDescriptionFourth: If the cake falls, it will simply break and will not be added to your balance.

first.title: MEV Protect
first.description: Protect your swaps from MEV attacks in 99% cases.

second.title: Multi-hop swaps
second.description: Use MEV Protect in exchanges with intermediate tokens
second.description2: Note: MEV Protect protects only the first hop, and does not affect the next hops in the route

third.title: Minimum swap amount
third.description: Use MEV Protect only for exchanges exceeding the amount

fourth.title: Additional information
fourth.description1: MEV Protect protects only the first hop, and does not affect the next hops in the route.
fourth.description2: MEV Protect does not guarantee protection, but uses the maximum capabilities of the blockchain for protection.
fourth.description3: MEV Protect does not allow emulate transaction.
